body: Hello Avicus members it's Acceqted wondering what you want to see on the forums! On past servers I have seen mini quizzes or cool weekly games people put on. I would love to run one, but I don't know what to do. I know there is already "Show Your Face To The World" which I think is totally Amazing!  What do you have in mind? A weekly quiz? Fun facts? Tell me what you think, and I'd be happy to run it for you :)!

title: New Trend? Weekly event?!
